package.name: QuitAll清理后台-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Swipe down on app switcher card to kill all apps!在应用程序切换卡向下滑动以结束所有程序，清理后台。

descriptionlist.description: Swipe down on app switcher card to kill all apps!在应用程序切换卡向下滑动以结束所有程序，清理后台。
